Class GetDirections

java.lang.Object
  gov.lbl.glamm.server.actions.requesthandlers.GetDirections
All Implemented Interfaces:
gov.lbl.glamm.server.RequestHandler
public class GetDirections
extends java.lang.Object
implements gov.lbl.glamm.server.RequestHandler

Service class and Non-RPC request handler for finding routes (retrosynthetic pathways) between source and destination compounds for a given organism and map.

getDirections

public static java.util.List<gov.lbl.glamm.client.model.Pathway> getDirections(gov.lbl.glamm.server.GlammSession sm,
                                                                               gov.lbl.glamm.client.model.Organism organism,
                                                                               gov.lbl.glamm.client.model.Compound cpdSrc,
                                                                               gov.lbl.glamm.client.model.Compound cpdDst,
                                                                               java.lang.String mapTitle,
                                                                               gov.lbl.glamm.client.model.Algorithm algorithm)
Gets the list of pathways between the source and destination compound for a given organism on a given map.

Parameters:
sm - The GLAMM session.
organism - The optional organism
cpdSrc - The source compound.
cpdDst - The destination compound.
mapTitle - The map title.
algorithm - The algorithm used to find these pathways.
Returns:
The list of pathways.
